identity.name: TSMarket
identity.description: A gamified e-commerce experience that breaks the 'dark mode only' gamer stereotype. It uses high-contrast neon accents on a pristine, pale-mint background to create a 'Solar Punk' aesthetic. Think Mirror's Edge meets Jet Set Radio.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(13,148,136,0.3)] transition-all duration-300 hover:scale-105 active:scale-95 font-bold uppercase tracking-wider
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(240,171,252,0.4)] transition-all duration-300 font-bold
buttons.outline: border-2 border-primary text-primary hover:bg-primary hover:text-white transition-all duration-300 font-bold uppercase

cards.product: bg-white border border-border hover:border-primary/50 shadow-sm hover:shadow-[0_10px_40px_-10px_rgba(13,148,136,0.2)] transition-all duration-300 group relative overflow-hidden
cards.feature: bg-white/50 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/20 shadow-lg hover:-translate-y-2 transition-transform duration-300

inputs.default: bg-white border-2 border-input focus:border-primary focus:ring-4 focus:ring-primary/20 rounded-lg px-4 py-3 transition-all duration-200 font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground/70

navigation.wrapper: fixed top-0 w-full z-50 bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-xl border-b border-border/50
navigation.link: text-sm font-bold uppercase tracking-widest hover:text-primary transition-colors relative after:content-[''] after:absolute after:bottom-[-4px] after:left-0 after:w-0 after:h-[2px] after:bg-primary hover:after:w-full after:transition-all

gamification_ui.xp_bar: h-4 bg-muted rounded-full overflow-hidden relative after:absolute after:top-0 after:left-0 after:h-full after:bg-gradient-to-r after:from-primary after:to-secondary after:w-[var(--progress)] after:transition-all after:duration-1000
gamification_ui.badge: inline-flex items-center px-3 py-1 rounded-full text-xs font-bold uppercase tracking-wide bg-accent/20 text-accent-foreground border border-accent/50
gamification_ui.level_indicator: w-12 h-12 rounded-full bg-gradient-to-br from-primary to-secondary flex items-center justify-center text-white font-black text-lg shadow-lg ring-4 ring-white

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. THEME ENFORCEMENT: Do NOT use dark mode by default. The user explicitly asked for a 'light green-aquamarine background'. Use the palette provided.
2. FONT USAGE: Use 'Unbounded' for all Headings (h1-h3) to give that gamer/tech feel. Use 'Outfit' for body text.
3. GAMIFICATION: Every interaction should feel like a game. Add hover effects, scaling, and subtle glows to all interactive elements.
4. COMPONENTS: Customize Shadcn components to match the 'Solar Punk' aesthetic. Remove default rounded-md and use rounded-xl or rounded-full.
5. IMAGES: Use the provided asset URLs. Do not use placeholders.
6. LAYOUT: Avoid boring grids. Use the 'Bento' layout strategy for the catalog and profile.
7. ADMIN PANEL: This is hidden. Keep it functional but consistent with the brand (maybe a 'Dark Mode' version of the site for contrast).
universal_guidelines: Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters.
All interactive elements MUST include data-testid attributes.
